QuestData.Title: Aces High!
QuestData.Description: You possess the courage to draw so near to Malygos' lair, mortal? Or is it simply ignorance? Soon we shall know....$b$bI am a seasoned trainer of the graceful drakes of the red dragonflight. My business here is to study the enemy and teach my precious pets the tactics that will be most effective when we face the master of the blues.$b$bTo demonstrate your nerve and ability, I will allow you to ride one of my drakes against the enemy's minions.$b$bThe opportunity is yours for the asking...
QuestData.LogDescription: Corastrasza on the upper ring of the Nexus in Coldarra wants you to ride her drake and kill 5 Scalesworn Elites.
QuestData.CompletionText: Well, mortal, what do you think of my pets?
QuestData.RewardText: My drake tells me that with practice, you might become a capable combatant.$b$bVery well, then. In the interest of our war on Malygos, I shall allow you to practice with my pets at your leisure.$b$bMake ready, $r, for he is a fierce and unforgiving opponent.
